name: Pinball Versus (2 players)
description:
First version of Pinball Versus, a head-to-head pinball game for 2 players.

Introducing the first pinball table: Woody, a home-made style all wood and hand operated pinball. The game includes a simple editor to create your own tables and upload them to the Online Library, where you can discover other people's designs and share yours.

This game is in active development and there will be updates with other pinball themes, coming next: Soccer.
